itemInvoiceItem.quantity: {% if quantity %}{{ quantity }}{% else %}{% if object.quantity %}{{ object.quantity }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
itemInvoiceItem.inventoryItemUid: {% if inventoryItemUid %}{{ inventoryItemUid }}{% else %}{% if object.inventoryItemUid %}{{ object.inventoryItemUid }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
itemInvoiceItem.description: {% if description %}{{ description }}{% else %}{% if object.description %}{{ object.description }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
itemInvoiceItem.taxCode: {% if taxCode %}{{ taxCode }}{% else %}{% if object.taxCode %}{{ object.taxCode }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
itemInvoiceItem.unitPriceInclTax: {% if unitPriceInclTax %}{{ unitPriceInclTax }}{% else %}{% if object.unitPriceInclTax %}{{ object.unitPriceInclTax }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
itemInvoiceItem.percentageDiscount: {% if percentageDiscount %}{{ percentageDiscount }}{% else %}{% if object.percentageDiscount %}{{ object.percentageDiscount }}{% else %}{% endif %}{% endif %}
